title: Analysis of Factors Influencing E-Learning Usage Intentions: Project Learning Based on the UTAUT2 Model

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, providing a project-based environment to strengthen e-learning tool utilization skills for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the seven core factors of the UTAUT2 model (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, etc.) to e-learning utilization cases.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the impact of personal innovativeness (PI) and perceived financial cost (PFC) on e-learning usage intentions.
Learners can design team-based e-learning platform improvement plans using PBL methods and ensure over 80% achievement rates through formative assessments.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
